name: Grilled Chicken Salad
description: A healthy and protein-rich salad with grilled chicken, vegetables, and a light dressing.
reason: Boosts energy and keeps you full
ingredients: Grilled chicken, lettuce, cherry tomatoes, cucumber, olive oil, lemon juice
nutritionalBenefits: Rich in protein, vitamins A and C, and healthy fats

name: Oatmeal with Berries
description: Warm oatmeal topped with fresh berries and a drizzle of honey.
reason: Perfect for cozy mornings or stressful days
nutritionalBenefits: High in fiber, antioxidants, and supports heart health

name: Spaghetti Bolognese
description: Classic Italian pasta with rich tomato and beef sauce.
ingredients: Spaghetti, ground beef, tomatoes, onion, garlic, herbs
nutritionalBenefits: Good source of protein and iron

name: Avocado Toast
description: Crispy toast topped with creamy avocado and optional toppings.
ingredients: Bread, avocado, lemon juice, chili flakes, salt
nutritionalBenefits: High in healthy fats and fiber
